title: Don’t believe this FAKE picture of Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal is doing rounds on social media in which he can be seen dressed in a woman’s attire.

The caption with the picture in Hindi read: “शाहीनबाग की सलमा आपा.”

ALSO READ: Don’t believe this FAKE picture of Deepika Padukone being injured

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture.

The woman in the original picture is Lady Olenna Redwyne Tyrell- a fictional character in the popular TV series Game of Thrones. The character is played by British actress Diana Rigg.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that Kejriwal’s face was superimposed on Diana Rigg’s face using photo editing software to create a FAKE image.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
